page.title: 01Summary of area as a whole
page.content: The area we have been studying is made up of lots of different places;Boothen, West End,Hanford,Clayton,Trent-Vale and Penkhull.All the places are very different from each other. Hanford is mainly a housing estate with some farm land around it.Where Hanford and Boothen come together there is a very busy road system.This was built about seven years ago.The Michelin factory takes up a lot of space in this area.Trent-Vale is mainly council housing while Clayton is a mixture of council estates and large private houses. Boothen and West End have many streets of terraced houses.There are lots of small shops along the main road. Penkhull is a residential area.The houses are detached and semi-detached. Most of them have large gardens.
